          <title>
            <string language="en">Bacteria and viruses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bakterium und Viren</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bactéries et virus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Bactérias e vírus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Batteri e virus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βακτηρίδια και ιοί</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Bacterias y virus</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how viruses and bacteria may enter the human body: through breathing, eating, and skin cuts.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">microbes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bacteria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">flu</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">food</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">open wounds</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">salmonella</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tetanus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">virus</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie Viren und Bakterium den
menschlichen Körper eintragen können: durch die Atmung, das 
Essen und die Hautschnitte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment les virus et les
bactéries peuvent écrire le corps humain : en respirant, en 
mangeant, et des coupes de peau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como os vírus e as 
bactérias podem incorporar o corpo humano: através de 
respirar, de comer, e dos cortes da pele.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come i virus ed i 
batteri possono entrare nel corpo umano: attraverso la 
respirazione, il consumo ed i tagli della pelle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς οι ιοί και τα 
βακτηρίδια μπορούν να εισαγάγουν το ανθρώπινο σώμα: μέσω 
της αναπνοής, της κατανάλωσης, και των αποκοπών δερμάτων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo los virus y las 
bacterias pueden incorporar el cuerpo humano: a través de la 
respiración, de comer, y de cortes de la piel.</string>
          </description>
